channel.title: Analytics on Stencilled
channel.description: Recent content in Analytics on Stencilled

item.title: Is Your Website Built for LLMs? Why Analytics Needs to Rethink the Funnel
item.description: In a world where large language models are the first point of contact, your website needs to speak to them as much as it does to your users. Here's how analytics teams can help rewire the funnel.

item.title: Benchmarks vs. Baselines: When 'Above Average' Isn't Good Enough
item.description: Why relying on external benchmarks in media analytics can be misleading, and how building your own baselines leads to smarter, more context-aware decision making.

item.title: Stop Asking for Data You'll Never Use
item.description: The real problem isn't the dashboard. It's how we treat data as a checklist, not a conversation. Learn how to make analytics work harder for the right questions.

item.title: Why Every Media Team Needs a Measurement Playbook (Not Just a Dashboard)
item.description: Demystifying media analytics tools like MMM and incrementality testing, and how to leverage them to move from tactical execution to strategic mastery.

item.title: Why Every Media Team Needs an Analytics Agent
item.description: From dashboards to decisions â€” AI is now the analyst. Explore how analytics agents are transforming media teams by providing instant insights and automated analysis.

item.title: AMI Dashboard
item.description: Adaptive Media Intelligence - Comprehensive Analytics Dashboard

item.title: Empowering Media Campaigns with Dynamic Analytics
item.description: How to create effective interactive dashboards for media campaigns

item.title: Building a Strong Data Infrastructure
item.description: Learn why establishing a robust data infrastructure is crucial for digital marketing and media campaigns, and how tools like ETL and data warehousing solutions can streamline your analytics process.
